subject: Investment Trends - New Site Migration
preview: Hey Allie + Manuel,  Quick heads up on this upcoming task.  Background:  - Investment Trends has a brand new website built on WordPress 6.82, without using Elementor. - The site was designed for easy

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena
Andy Crebar changed the customer to Sophie O'Neill

full_threads.body:
Hey Allie + Manuel,

Quick heads up on this upcoming task.

Background:

- Investment Trends has a brand new website built on WordPress 6.82,
without using Elementor.
- The site was designed for easy content updates, with plans to
integrate an SEO tool and a form tool.
- Investment Trends is currently on Wolf IQ's Pro care plan at
$250/month, which covers hosting, maintenance, and support.

What needs to be done:

- Andy to do a final QA review of the new website, including checking
page titles, descriptions, and overall performance. This should take about
0.5-1 hour.
- Once the QA is complete, Wolf IQ will move the new site to their
staging servers, then migrate it to the live production environment.
- Investment Trends to provide Wolf IQ with login details for the new
WordPress site.

The goal is to have the new site live by the week of August 11th. Please
let me know if you need any clarification or have additional questions!

Full context available in video below.

Meeting Purpose Discuss Investment Trends' new website launch and ongoing
support from Wolf IQ Key Takeaways - Investment Trends is launching a new
WordPress site, moving from Wolf IQ's build to an offshore provider -
Current Pro Care Plan ($250/mo) covers hosting, maintenance, and 2hrs
support; considering upgrade to Expert Plan ($500/mo, 5hrs) - Wolf IQ to
conduct final QA review, assist with SEO optimization, and manage site
migration to their servers before Aug 11 launch Topics Current Wolf IQ
Services - Pro Care Plan ($250/mo) includes: - Hosting ($20-$50 value) -
Maintenance ($50-$100 value) - 2 hours of support - Built original site in
Feb 2023 - Handling ongoing updates (e.g., media releases, contact changes)
New Website Overview - Built on WordPress 6.82 (non-Elementor) - Designed
for easy content updates - Planned integrations: SEO tool, Hotjar (heat
mapping), dynamic form (Contact Form 7 or Gravity Forms) SEO and Content
Strategy - Current site ranks well for branded keywords, opportunity in
non-branded - Recommendation to improve backlinks from media coverage -
Suggestion to showcase media logos on homepage for brand association - Need
to update page titles and meta descriptions across new site Content
Management - Discussed process for uploading media coverage (15-30 min per
article) - Recommendation to restructure news page, limit to recent years -
Importance of backlinks in media coverage for SEO benefit Additional Tools
and Tips - Suggested Microsoft Clarity as free alternative to Hotjar -
Emphasized importance of keeping original content on-site for SEO benefits
Next Steps - Sophie to finalize site content and provide login details to
Andy - Wolf IQ to conduct comprehensive QA review (est. 30-60 min) - Plan
site migration to Wolf IQ servers for staging and final checks - Target
launch date: week of August 11th - Consider upgrading to Expert Plan for
additional support hours if needed - Implement suggested SEO improvements
(backlinks, page titles, meta descriptions) - Restructure news/media
coverage display on site
